alert.note: Alert for Siskiyou (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 21 at 4:39PM PDT until August 21 at 7:30PM PDT by NWS Medford
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM PDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of Mt. Shasta City and roadways up to the Mt. Shasta Ski Park including Everitt Memorial Road. * WHEN...Until 730 PM PDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 435 PM PDT, Local law enforcement reported a debris flow across portions of Everitt Memorial Highway near Mount Shasta City due to heavy rain. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Overflowing poor drainage areas will cause minor flooding near Mount Shasta. Between 0.2 and 0.7 inches of rain have fallen. - Everitt Memorial Highway near Mount Shasta is the most likely place to experience minor flooding. Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Everitt Memorial highway near Mount Shasta, Mount Shasta Bunny Flat Trail, Mcbride Springs Campground, Mount Shasta Summit Plateau and Mount Shasta Ski Park Highway. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
